review: lovely film...unexpected ending....but not a happy one.but still one can learn an important lesson in his or her life.and that is:love your caring partner to the fullest and extreme level of joy and happiness and you will be rewarded life-long. ...

one of my favorite love story, the lesson is ''say today, love today'' -don't wait for tomorrow.! i wish i can act upon on the same rule.
